news.title: The best fans to keep you cool: 14 tried and tested favourites to beat the heat
news.summary: Chill your space – and avoid energy-guzzling air con – with our pick of the best fans. Air con is incredibly effective, but it uses a lot of electricity. Save money and carbon by opting for a great fan instead.

news.title: ‘It fully altered my taste in music’: bands reflect on the awesome power of the Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater soundtracks
news.summary: Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater introduced a whole generation to hopped up US punk and metal. Bands including Less Than Jake, the Ataris and AFI pay tribute to a gaming megastar who loves them back.
